summary: Marine hero Al Schmid is blinded in battle and returns home to be rehabilitated. He readjusts to his civilian life with the help of his soon to be wife.
cast: John Garfield|Eleanor Parker|Dane Clark|John Ridgely|Rosemary DeCamp|Ann Doran|Ann E. Todd|Warren Douglas|Don McGuire|Tom D'Andrea|Rory Mallinson|Mark Stevens|Anthony Caruso|Moroni Olsen|Leonard Bremen|Michael Browne|John Compton|James Conaty|Charles Evans|Frank Faylen|Mary Gordon|William Haade|William Hudson|Fred Kelsey|John Miles|George Reed|Dick Rich|Harry Shannon|John Sheridan|Charles Sherlock|Dave Willock|Bud Wolfe
title: El orgullo de los marines
